Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Inspired by the jumbojet testplatform carriers the americans have used for decades, i thought id build an aircraft to lift my rocket far up into the atmosphere before launcing. I call it the moon carrier. The carrier manages to carry the rocket to at least 14000 meters before the air gets too thin. It has a fairly high AOA at this point, actually aiding the launch of the next stage. The second stage launch you into orbit. With the third you land on the Mun, and return safely. Enjoy!

That looks nice!

Also, while not necessarily a whole plane, this design can get to the mun and back.

I\'ve been toying with a similar desing mine does not like to launch smoothly. Bar that hic up I can get the whole plane section out of atmo thus allowing a very snug and light payload. Just an idea where to move your project towards.
